titleStmt.title: The remaining discourses, on the attributes of God Viz. his Goodness. His mercy. His patience. His long-suffering. His power. His spirituality. His immensity. His eternity. His incomprehensibleness. God the first cause, and last end. By the most reverend Dr. John Tillotson, late Lord Arch-Bishop of Canterbury. Being the seventh volume; published from the originals, by Ralph Barker, D.D. chaplain to his Grace.
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
Barker, Ralph, 1648-1708, publisher.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Ri. Chiswell, at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: With portrait of Tillotson on A1v.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
